mapper.select: select a.id,a.freetime, a.startingPrice,a.distinguish, a.startingPriceDuration, a.increaseIncome, a.freeTimeState,a.startingpriceState, a.superiorLimit, a.parkingLotInformationId, a.type, b.parkingChargingId as sub_parkingChargingId, b.minutecharge as sub_minuteCharge,b.superiorlimit as sub_superiorLimit,b.starTime as sub_starTime, b.endTime as sub_endTime, b.addMoney as sub_addMoney, b.startingPrice as sub_startingPrice, b.startingTime as sub_startingTime, b.type as sub_type from parking_charging a left join parking_billing_period b on b.parkingChargingId = a.id where a.id = #{id}
mapper.insert:
insert into parking_charging
startingPrice, startingPriceDuration, increaseIncome, freeTimeState, startingpriceState, superiorLimit, parkingLotInformationId, type, distinguish, freetime,
#{startingprice}, #{startingpriceduration}, #{increaseincome}, #{freeTimeState}, #{startingpriceState}, #{superiorlimit}, #{parkinglotinformationid}, #{type}, #{distinguish}, #{freetime},
mapper.delete:
delete from parking_charging where id in
#{id}

delete from parking_billing_period where parkingChargingId in
#{parkingChargingId}
mapper.insert:
insert into parking_billing_period( parkingChargingId, starTime, endTime, addMoney, startingPrice, startingTime, type, minuteCharge,superiorLimit) values
( #{item.parkingchargingid}, #{item.startime}, #{item.endtime}, #{item.addmoney}, #{item.startingprice}, #{item.startingtime}, #{item.type}, #{item.minutecharge}, #{item.superiorlimit})
mapper.select: select a.*, b.parkingChargingId as sub_parkingChargingId, b.minutecharge as sub_minuteCharge,b.superiorlimit as sub_superiorLimit,b.starTime as sub_starTime, b.endTime as sub_endTime, b.addMoney as sub_addMoney, b.startingPrice as sub_startingPrice, b.startingTime as sub_startingTime, b.type as sub_type from parking_charging a left join parking_billing_period b on b.parkingChargingId = a.id where a.parkingLotInformationId = #{parkinglotinformationid} and a.distinguish=#{distinguish}

select a.id,a.freetime, a.startingPrice,a.distinguish, a.startingPriceDuration, a.increaseIncome, a.freeTimeState,a.startingpriceState, a.superiorLimit, a.parkingLotInformationId, a.type, b.parkingChargingId as sub_parkingChargingId, b.minutecharge as sub_minuteCharge,b.superiorlimit as sub_superiorLimit,b.starTime as sub_starTime, b.endTime as sub_endTime, b.addMoney as sub_addMoney, b.startingPrice as sub_startingPrice, b.startingTime as sub_startingTime, b.type as sub_type from parking_charging a left join parking_billing_period b on b.parkingChargingId = a.id where a.parkingLotInformationId = #{parkingLotInformationId}
